[http://www.amrindergill.co.uk/ Amrinder Gill Official Website] | notable_instruments = }} '''Amrinder Gill''' ({{lang-pa|à¨à¨®à¨°à¨¿à©°à¨¦à¨° à¨à¨¿à©±à¨²}}) is a [[Punjabi people|Punjabi]] singer and an actor. ==Career== Born and raised in village Boorchand Amritsar, Punjab, Amrinder Gill has become a firm favorite with the new generation of Punjabi music fans with his laid back style, up-market video and catchy Punjabi pop tracks, while having a hold over Desi lovers with his range of emotional songs. His breakthrough track âPaigamâ established him a voice of the future and he has since gone from strength to strength with hits like âDaruâ, âMadhaaniaâ, âKhedan De Dinâ with Sunidhi Chauhan, and the colossal hits âMail Kara de â and âDildarianâ. He had no direct musical influence during his upbringing. He earned a Master's degree in agricultural science.{{cite news|last=Singh|first=Charandeep|title=Paajis of pop Read more at: http://indiatoday.intoday.in/story/paajis-of-pop/1/110356.html|url=http://indiatoday.intoday.in/story/paajis-of-pop/1/110356.html|accessdate=29 October 2011|newspaper=India Today|date=26 August 2010}} ==Movies== He made his movie debut in director [[Manmohan Singh]]'s (director) 2009 [[Munde U.K. De]].
